Author: jl777c#5810
Content: updated jl777 branch with new version. it works now much better and has nonfungible token data for the playerdata, also a new rpc "players" that will display all your players. you should be able to register with the playertxid and start the dungeon with that character. side effect is that all the magic is deciphered. if this makes the game too easy, I can make it so only things that are actually known can be seen

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: found a bug with using the data. for now you can create the non-fungible token and trade it but it cant be used in a new game, will fix that later

Author: TonyL#3577
Content:
To test:
```
git clone https://github.com/tonymorony/komodo_cryptoconditions_tui 
cd komodo_cryptoconditions_tui
cp -r * ~/komodo/src
cd  ~/komodo/src
 ./rogue_tui.py ```

pip dependencies remained the same as before (can be found in repo readme). 
p.s. Your path to needed komodo might be different - it's just an example
p.p.s You need ROGUE daemon up

[8] Exit
